name: Smash (YASHTUF)
description:
Your Goal is: Demolish the structure completely to  move to the next level

Make everything fall apart!

  • Throw balls at structures to make them collapse but be careful not to exceed the allowed limit!
  • Each saved ball will count and be multiplied at the following levels, take advantage of it to apply you!
  • One-tap easy-to-learn controls
  • Addictive gameplay mechanics
